messages.subject: Friends (was help)
messages.msgSnippet: I am trying to find more unschoolers in our area for both of us! Maybe you already did this, but if you post where you live, we might know of a group or
messages.messageBody:
"I am trying to find more unschoolers in our area for both of us!"

Maybe you already did this, but if you post where you live, we might
know of a group or family that is nearby.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
